battleship

Class Cell

  • java.lang.Object
    • battleship.Cell

  • public class Cell
extends java.lang.Object
    a cell in the battleship game, it can contains a ship... or not and can have been shot... or not

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static char EMPTY 
      static char HIT 
      static char SHIP 
      static char UNKNOWN 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Cell()
      creates an empty cell never shot

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      char getCharacter(boolean defender)
      provides a character depending of the cell's state : empty, with a hit ship, a safe ship or unknown
      Ship getShip()
      provides the ship in this cell (null if none)
      boolean hasBeenShot()
      tells whether this cell has already been shot or not
      void setShip(Ship ship)
      sets a ship in this case
      void shot()
      this cell is shot, then if there is a ship it is hit

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • hasBeenShot

        public boolean hasBeenShot()
        tells whether this cell has already been shot or not
        Returns:
        true iff the cell has already been shot

      • shot

        public void shot()
        this cell is shot, then if there is a ship it is hit
